group.label: Basic data
group.comment:
Your Full Service Payment Provider - Comprehensive solutions from one single source

Qenta is one of the world's leading providers of outsourcing and white label solutions for electronic payment transactions.

As independent provider of payment solutions, we accompany our customers along the entire business development. Our payment solutions are perfectly tailored to suit e-Commerce requirements and have made us Austria's leading payment service provider. Customization, competence, and commitment.

General information regarding Qenta Shop Plugins

field.label: Configuration
field.comment: For integration, select predefined configuration settings or "production" for live systems.

field.label: Customer ID
field.comment: Your Qenta customer number. More information.

field.label: Shop ID
field.comment: Shop identifier in case of more than one shop. Please contact our sales teams to activate this feature. More information: shopId

field.label: Secret
field.comment: String which you received from Qenta for signing and validating data to prove their authenticity. More information.

field.label: Backend password
field.comment: Password for back-end operations (Toolkit). More information. If this password is not set, back-end operations are not possible.

field.label: Order creation
field.comment: Selecting "Always", orders are created even if the payment process leads to failed payment. Selecting "Only for successful payments", orders are created if the payment process was successful.

field.label: URL to imprint page
field.comment: URL on the payment page which leads to the imprint page of the online shop. More information.

field.label: Text on payment page
field.comment: Text displayed during the payment process, i.e. "Thank you for ordering in xy-shop". More information.

field.label: URL to image on payment page
field.comment: URL to an image/logo which is displayed during the payment process in Qenta Checkout Page. More information.

field.label: Background color for credit card logos
field.comment: Background color for the image containing the credit card brand logos. More information.

field.label: Shop reference in posting text
field.comment: Reference to your online shop on your consumer's invoice, limited to 9 characters (used together with the order number to create the parameter customerStatement).

field.label: Forward consumer shipping data
field.comment: Forwarding shipping data about your consumer to the respective financial service provider.

field.label: Forward consumer billing data
field.comment: Forwarding billing data about your consumer to the respective financial service provider.

field.label: Notification e-mail
field.comment: Receiving notification by e-mail regarding the orders of your consumers if an error occurred in the communication between Qenta and your online shop. More information. Please contact our sales teams to activate this feature.

field.label: Forward basket data
field.comment: Forwarding basket data to the respective financial service provider.

field.label: Device type optimization
field.comment:
Device type for which Qenta Checkout Page should be optimized ("desktop", "tablet" or "smartphone"; parameter layout).
Has to be enabled by Qenta on your behalf.

field.label: Check for duplicate requests
field.comment: Checking duplicate requests made by your consumer. More information.

field.label: Max. retries
field.comment: Maximum number of payment attempts regarding a certain order. More information.

field.label: Payment method sort order
field.comment:
Sort order of payment methods and sub-methods in the payment method selection area. More information.
Has to be enabled by Qenta on your behalf.

group.label: Qenta Checkout Page Online bank transfer.

field.label: payolution terms
field.comment: Consumer must accept payolution terms during the checkout process. More information.

field.label: payolution mID
field.comment: Your payolution merchant ID, non-base64-encoded.

field.label: Minimum age
field.comment: Only applicable for RatePAY.

field.label: Billing and shipping address must be identical
field.comment: Billing and shipping address must be identical.

field.label: payolution terms
field.comment: Consumer must accept payolution terms during the checkout process. More information.

field.label: payolution mID
field.comment: Your payolution merchant ID, non-base64-encoded.

field.label: Billing and shipping address must be identical
field.comment: Billing and shipping address must be identical.

field.label: Transaction identifier
field.comment: This parameter defines whether a transaction is a single (one-off) transaction or an initial transaction followed by many subsequent transactions (e.g. for subscription models). More information.

group.label: Qenta Checkout Page SEPA Direct Debit

field.label: Transaction identifier
field.comment: With this parameter you can define whether a transaction is a single (one-off) transaction or an initial transaction followed by many subsequent ones (e.g. for subscription models). More information.
